doc.title: Orfey i govedata
doc.plot: A virtuoso Bulgarian accordionist wins prestigious international awards, releases CD in France, but a crafty impresario vanishes with his fee. The protagonist has to support his two children and his old parents living in the country and while taking the cattle to graze he prepares for the next international contest. This film is about the individualist and his struggle to survive and create his art in difficult times of changes.
